text: It was just another normal day on Planet Earth. It was a beautiful normal day like any other, Vini was living his normal life, he still hadn't showered, and he was talking to his friend Yasmin through Discord. It was a simple super decisive conversation for her to finally pay the X-Tudo Vini wanted so much. Vini was very happy, as he had been waiting for this day for several months, so this was the decisive magic moment.
Yasmin then looked at the monitor impatiently, and just wanted to get this story over with, so he wouldn't need to talk about X-Tudo anymore
ah! Ready! I finally got my tiny credit card working! I'm going to buy your X-Tudo now! Now it's time to stop this silly nonsense time!
